subject: Social Media
Basketball
lead_paragraph: In an escalating series of posts on his Twitter account, J. R. Smith appeared to threaten the Pistons’ Brandon Jennings for picking on his younger brother, Chris, a guard with the Knicks.
snippet: In an escalating series of posts on his Twitter account, J. R. Smith appeared to threaten the Pistons’ Brandon Jennings for picking on his younger brother, Chris, a guard with the Knicks.
